data.title: YWAM Denmark
data.meta_description: Interdenominational Worldwide Mission Organization working with evangelism, training camp; mercy ministries, tværkirkelig verdensomspændende
data.text:
With it’s long history, YWAM Denmark continues to build on the foundation of the many people who have preceded us, to build and equip young people from all over the world.

Youth With A Mission (YWAM) is one of the largest international cross-missionary missions in the world. We take it seriously when Jesus says:

”He said to them, “Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation.” (Mark 16:15)

YWAM works with three areas internationally and nationally

Training

Evangelism

Mercy Ministries

We do our work in these three areas with our desire to “know God and make Him known” as the foundation.

In Denmark, YWAM works to communicate the gospel of Jesus Christ in a relevant way in all spheres of society – in Denmark and internationally.
